review: Convenient yet inconvenient.Reasons why it's convenient:SmallIncludes batteriesLoads fastReasons why it's inconvenient:Still requires a power cable not exactly shown in the pictures (however if your TV, or in my case your cable box, has a USB port you can use that), otherwise you need to still have a power cable running to the wallNo voice search like the regular Amazon Fire TVStick is a little long so you need to use the side port if your TV is mounted to the wall.All in all this product will do exactly what you want it to do.  And is reasonably priced.  But if size and price are not a concern I would recommend buying the regular Fire TV.
